entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers this evening. Rain beginning near midnight. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h. Temperature steady near plus 3. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain mixed with snow changing to snow in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h in the morning. High plus 3 with temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Tuesday 14 February 2023
